pr_title: HBASE-23834 HBase fails to run on Hadoop 3.3.0/3.2.2/3.1.4 due to jet…

timeline.bodyText: are these coming in from the new shaded jetty? can we shade them there rather then keep them as transitive dependencies?
timeline.author: busbey

replies.bodyText: The classes are located under javax, so I assume they are just repackaging of some javax classes, so I exclude them in the shaded artifacts.
replies.author: Apache9
